name: burn-net
description: A neural network example using the Burn framework for deep learning in Rust
author: Ferrisup Team
next_steps: 🧠 Train the neural network: cd {{project_name}} && cargo run -- train
🔍 Test the model with new data: cargo run -- test
📊 Visualize model performance: cargo run -- visualize
💾 Save and load models: cargo run -- save && cargo run -- load
📚 See all available commands: cargo run -- help
